forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

confirm_password.title: Secure Area
confirm_password.description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

update_profile_information.title: Profile Information
update_profile_information.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.
update_profile_information.name: Name
update_profile_information.resend_verification: Click here to re-send the verification email.
update_profile_information.verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

update_password.title: Update Password
update_password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.

two_factor_authentication.title: Two Factor Authentication
two_factor_authentication.description: Add additional security to your account using two factor authentication.
two_factor_authentication.enabled: You have enabled two factor authentication.
two_factor_authentication.disabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
two_factor_authentication.description_2: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
two_factor_authentication.qr_code: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
two_factor_authentication.recovery_codes: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.

logout_other_browser_sessions.title: Log Out Other Browser Sessions
logout_other_browser_sessions.description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
logout_other_browser_sessions.content: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
logout_other_browser_sessions.enter_password: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.

delete_user.title: Delete Account
delete_user.content: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete_user.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

sessions_whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Sessions
sessions_whatsapp.content: If necessary, you can log out of all your other WhatsApp sessions across all your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
sessions_whatsapp.connected: Currently connected to WhatsApp. If you disconnect your account, you will not be able to send WhatsApp messages or issue notifications.
sessions_whatsapp.qr_code: To connect your WhatsApp account, scan the QR code below using the WhatsApp application on your phone.

create_token.title: Crear Token de API
create_token.description: Los tokens de API permiten que los servicios de terceros se autentiquen con nuestra aplicación en tu nombre.
create_token.name: Nombre

manage_tokens.title: Gestionar Tokens de API
manage_tokens.description: Puedes eliminar cualquiera de tus tokens existentes si ya no los necesitas.

token.title: Token de API
token.content: Por favor, copia tu nuevo token de API. Por tu seguridad, no se mostrará nuevamente.

delete.title: Eliminar Token de API
delete.content: ¿Estás seguro de que deseas eliminar este token de API?
